table_description: Stores custom fields and values associated with invoices.

table_columns.name: id
table_columns.description: treat this column as primary key like 'id' for table

table_columns.name: invoice_id
table_columns.description: Reference to the invoice this custom field is associated with.

table_columns.name: invoices_custom_id
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.name: name
table_columns.description: Name or label of the custom field. this is important column for query

table_columns.name: type
table_columns.description: Data type or category of the custom field (e.g., text, number, date).

table_columns.name: value
table_columns.description: The actual value stored in the custom field. important column for query

table_columns.name: _weld_synced
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY
